alert.note: Alert for Wasatch Mountains I-80 North; Wasatch Mountains South of I-80 (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 18 at 3:14AM MDT until April 18 at 7:00PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph late afternoon through early evening. * WHERE...Wasatch Mountains I-80 North and Wasatch Mountains South of I-80. * WHEN...Until 7 PM MDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions are expected, particularly for Logan Summit and the upper Cottonwoods.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx.

area.areaDesc: Wasatch Mountains I-80 North; Wasatch Mountains South of I-80
